value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We've been traveling for some time...
and yet...we haven't encountered
a soul.$k$pNone of us wants to say it, but...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|They're all dead. Down to the last.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No! That can't be! Everyone? But...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I do not like the idea any more than
you do. But do you have another?
One that better fits the evidence?$k$pHowever...even if we accept that
premise, we don't know why.$k$pThis Askr seems to be no different
than our own. The streets, the shops,
the land, even the wind...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|It's like coming home.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Yet it suddenly fell into ruin... This
world is dead.$k$pWhat could have happened here?$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|So you're here.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|The enemy! Prepare to intercept!$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|How fitting that you will perish here,
in this ruined land.$k$pNow, die.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_06,0|$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|And yet you struggle. It is futile.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Líf and his forces have retreated.$k$p$EFace|It's getting dark. We can shelter in
this town overnight.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|OK! I'll get dinner started.$k$p$EFace_Cool2|Wait a second... Alfonse! Take a
look!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|A bouquet?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|You know these flowers...they're my
favorite.$k$pThey're all over the plaza, and not
just scattered randomly...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|These flowers were placed as a
memorial...as a tribute to someone
who died.$k$pDid Líf do this?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Does he care for the people of Askr?$k$pHe is our ancestor, I suppose... He
may look fearsome, but that doesn't
mean he doesn't have feelings.$k$pThinking of the citizens... He's just
like you and father.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Alfonse...?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Oh, sorry... I was lost in thought.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Something about all this bothers
me. I feel I have overlooked
an important detail...$k$p$Sbs150|
